channel.title: [Devlog] JRTS
channel.description:
JRTS is a project i started maybe 6 months ago. It's an idea that sprung up from my love for RTS games and procedural content generation.
I will not go in depth on what will make this unique when i reach the more content-critical stage as i'm afraid someone will steal my idea (yes, paranoia :( ), however i will show off the basic premise of the game.
Without further ado: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_SuN--MrRak - Video of engine in action. The music was an accident as i didn't mute my microphone while capturing.
The engine itself is written in Java, powered by OpenGL and JInput. All the assets and art plus the UI system i designed by me, which explains the horrid graphics :)
The plan is to get this prototype ready for basic gameplay and then start working on a less primitive version.
That's it!

item.title: [Devlog] JRTS
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:4, topic:411357”]How often do you work on this? Is it like your main project or are you kinda just workin on it here and there?

Anyways, looks pretty awesome so far.[/quote]I have no other projects at the moment, i work when i have time/feel like it. I also dedicate a great deal of my time becoming a leet sound engineer, so that gets more attention than this game for the most part.

Read full topic
